reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater to be of high quality, with a silky texture and comfortable fit that's not oversized.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buttery soft & looks and feels great!
items.body: Beautiful, soft, fits great, good quality, and would definitely buy again! The color is exactly what it says. Great value! Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Tia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and beautiful
items.body: Definitely thicker than I expected for the price, great quality fabric, super soft, well made and a great slightly loose fit. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice new sweater
items.body: This is a nice sweater, but more lightweight than I expected. It fits true to size, with sleeves a bit long, but can be cuffed up. I ordered light blue, and it was a lighter shade than expected. The knit is soft and very comfortable. The collar makes it more unique and stylish for this season. I feel it was a good value for the money. I was getting impatient for delivery since it was nearly 2 weeks. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Mid-Weight Sweater
items.body: Wonderful sweater! It is medium weight and holds it shape when washed (line dry). It's not itchy, but feels like wool. Deep green color as shown. Fits to size. Read more
items.author: Becky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don’t judge by Price
items.body: Classic sweater with a collar. For reference, I am 5’3”, 135 lbs. I bought Black and Navy in size Large. This sweater has a preppy vibe and a good length- not short , not tunic. Sleeves on myself can be worn either rolled once or not. It is roomy but not oversized. Not a bulky weight. Will be perfect to wear in Florida during the “Winter”. Don’t let the price fool you. This is a quality item that is well made and is comfortable. Read more
items.author: Sav

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good fit, good feel
items.body: I am usually wary of reviews that says the fit is true. Well in this case they are correct. It fits well. I am 5’ 125 lbs (yes I know should lose 10) I ordered small and it fits nicely. A bit long but it can be turned up without a problem and still look nice. The sleeves are long again not a problem as the cuff can be turned. I just pull up the sleeves anyway. Color is good and quality of fabric is thicker than I expected. Solid 5. Read more
items.author: M. Green

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars No wool in fabric but very itchy.
items.body: Great style, nice weight to this sweater but it is very itchy. My daughter bought the same one and we were both itching in it and had to take them off. I washed and hung to dry, then put in the dryer to soften/fluff. Still itchy!! Not sure what’s causing the itchiness…BPT maybe?? I guess I will try a tank under it as my return date has expired. Read more
items.author: nsimp

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: This sweater is rad. Classy and minimalist and a staple in my closet now. I may get more! I got the wheat colored one in a medium and I’m 5’9 and 170lbs. Fits perfectly and it’s super comfy too Read more
items.author: THW

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Tan, Forest Green, Nutmeg, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Dark Gray, Navy Blue, Light Blue, Red, Almond, Pink, White, Royal Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
